Regulation Name(s): Gene expression profiling test system for breast cancer prognosis
Analyte(s): Gene expression profile for breast cancer prognosis (70-gene signature)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MammaPrint microarray-based gene expression profiling test to assess risk of distant metastasis in breast cancer patients.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test to assess risk for distant metastasis in breast cancer patients less than 61 years old, Stage I/II, tumor size ≤5.0 cm, lymph node negative, as a prognostic marker used with other clinicopathological factors.
